creditline: The Christina N. and Swan J. Turnblad Memorial Fund
description: three old sepia images--from left to right:  Sonoma County geyser, New Mexican kiva and Multnomah Falls; hand-written text at bottom; printed text at top:  "GREAT GOD, OUR KING!"
marks: Signature, Title, Date and Edition on back at bottom, in pencil: [Great God Our King
title: Dear America:  Great God Our King
